name: Street Court
description:
NOTE: This game does not advocate an ideology or political point of view. However, as a game about SOCIAL issues, diverse politics are directly or indirectly involved. If you don’t like it, don’t play.

THE GAME: The police are a fundamental organization for the whole of society. However, in many countries there are a few agents who deviate from good conduct and use their position to persecute, punish and even kill people at they own will.

This game is a tribute to the good cops and also the victims of the bad agents.

FEATURES:

  • Choice matters and can change the story
  • Three possible endings
  • Language selection (english and portuguese)
  • Music and SFX volume adjustment

CONTROLS: Use mouse position to choose, mouse click to confirm.

CREDITS: All assets are original and made by me (Swami Abdalla-Santos) within 48 hours at LD51. Art and Music are AI generated and customized by me.
